thread.title: Bhavana not acting in movies till Pulsar Suni Martin and others punished - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Bhavana not acting in movies till Pulsar Suni Martin and others punished - Tamil Movie News

title: Bhavana not acting in movies till Pulsar Suni Martin and others punished - Tamil Movie News
text: Why Bhavana not signing Tamil movies? The shocking atrocity that was meted out to Bhavana is stirring a hornet's nest as the investigation by the Kerala police seems to indicate an actor and two sons of a minister are said to be in close touch with the accused Pulsar Suni, Martin and others. Meanwhile Prithviraj had asked Bhavana to come back to acting as the heroine in his next film but she has pledged not to work again until all the accused in the horrendous act are brought to justice and punished.
